title: FS: Individual southern leaguers; PB Moriarty
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: FS: Individual southern leaguers; PB Moriarty
posts.post_content:
A few single southern leaguers plus a raw Polar Bear Moriarty.

Hindu Persons, SGC 20/1.5: SOLD

Old Mill Persons, PSA 4: $225

Old Mill Revelle, PSA 4: SOLD

Polar Bear Moriarty, vg-ex with typical tobacco stains $24

Prices are delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. (Check, cash, money order also OK and preferred).

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:  

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions[/URL].

Thanks,

Rob

VP Sports Cards

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/4-cardsf-b.jpg[/IMG]

Bump to say if you buy the Old Mill Persons, I'll throw in the Polar Bear Moriarty for free.

Plus, I have a lead on a Lenox red Cobb that I'll share with the buyer.

Thanks.
